intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce costs without compromising coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their insurance costs are too high or are exploring ways to optimize their expenses.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to provide personalized insurance savings calculators.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded calculators.

intents.sub_intent: how to choose the right insurance plan
intents.user_motivation: Users want to make informed decisions about selecting insurance plans that meet their needs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are comparing options or entering a new life stage (e.g., buying a home, starting a family).
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's expertise in financial planning to guide users in selecting optimal plans.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Comparison guides with visual charts and decision trees.

intents.sub_intent: common mistakes to avoid with insurance claims
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid errors that could lead to claim denial or reduced payouts.
intents.search_context: Users search this after experiencing a claim issue or proactively before filing a claim.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide step-by-step claim filing guides and tips to avoid pitfalls.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they are fully utilizing their insurance coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel uncertain about their policy benefits or after a major life event.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Offer personalized policy reviews and optimization tips through ING's digital platform.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Interactive tools and calculators for benefit optimization.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to choose the right insurance plan
common mistakes to avoid with insurance claims
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING's digital banking leadership and customer trust can be leveraged to provide personalized insurance insights and tools.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a unified hub for insurance optimization tips, calculators, and guides tailored to user needs.

highest_probability_streams: how to save money on insurance premiums
common mistakes to avoid with insurance claims
quick_wins: Develop listicles with actionable tips for saving on premiums.
Create step-by-step guides for avoiding claim mistakes.
strategic_priorities: Invest in interactive tools for personalized insurance optimization.
Build a comprehensive insurance resource hub to establish ING as a trusted advisor.
